Core

Class BoardSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.BoardSprite

  • public class BoardSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the representation of a sprite in a Board. It is a very simple sprite that can be drawn over a matrix board.
    Author:
    Marc

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int col1
      The column where the sprite will begin.
      int col2
      The column where the sprite will end.
      java.awt.Font font
      Font for the text if the Sprite is used as text
      java.awt.Image img
      image object for the sprite
      java.lang.String name
      the name of the sprite
      java.lang.String path
      The path to the image to that Sprite
      int row1
      The row where the sprite will begin.
      int row2
      The row where the sprite will end.
      boolean text
      Specifies whether this sprite is text.
      int textColor
      Color for the text if the Sprite is used as text

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardSprite(java.lang.String name, int r1, int c1, int r2, int c2, java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new board sprite

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        the name of the sprite

      • row1

        public int row1
        The row where the sprite will begin. The sprite upper border will be on the top of this row

      • col1

        public int col1
        The column where the sprite will begin. The sprite left border will be on the beggining of this column

      • row2

        public int row2
        The row where the sprite will end. The sprite lower border will be at the bottom of this row

      • col2

        public int col2
        The column where the sprite will end. The sprite right border will be at the end of this column

      • path

        public java.lang.String path
        The path to the image to that Sprite

      • text

        public boolean text
        Specifies whether this sprite is text. Text won't use an image path and will print the String specified as path.

      • font

        public java.awt.Font font
        Font for the text if the Sprite is used as text

      • textColor

        public int textColor
        Color for the text if the Sprite is used as text

      • img

        public java.awt.Image img
        image object for the sprite

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardSprite

        public BoardSprite(java.lang.String name,
                   int r1,
                   int c1,
                   int r2,
                   int c2,
                   java.lang.String path)
        Creates a new board sprite
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sprite
        r1 - The row where the sprite will begin. The sprite upper border will be on the top of this row
        c1 - The column where the sprite will begin. The sprite left border will be on the beggining of this column
        r2 - The row where the sprite will end. The sprite lower border will be at the bottom of this row
        c2 - The column where the sprite will end. The sprite right border will be at the end of this column
        path - The path to the image to that Sprite, or the text in a text Sprite
